inclusion.criterion: Patient is randomized to one of 2 groups: group 1 patients will receive Rengalin at 2 tablets 3 times a day for 4 weeks; group 2 patients will receive placebo using Rengalin dosing regimen for 4 weeks.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient is monitored for 4 weeks (screening, randomization - before day 1, treatment 4 weeks).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: At Visit 2 (after 4-week treatment period) compliance will be additionally assessed.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients of both sexes aged from 40 to 80 years old.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: COPD diagnosed (in accordance with the GOLD-2014 guidelines) ≥12 months before.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Stable course of COPD (≥ 6 weeks free of disease progression).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Mild, moderate or severe degree of bronchial obstruction (FEV1/FVC < 0.7; post-bronchodilator FEV1 ≥30% of predicted value).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Stable dose of standard therapy within the preceding 4 weeks.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Use of and adherence to contraceptive methods by fertile-age patients of both sexes during the study.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Availability of a signed patient information sheet (Informed Consent form) for participation in the trial.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Earlier diagnosis of intra- or extrathoracic causes of cough (e.g., asthma, malignant neoplasm of lung, tuberculosis, sarcoidosis, α1-antitrypsin deficiency, bronchiectasis, cystic fibrosis, interstitial pulmonary diseases, perennial allergic rhinitis, gastro-oesophageal reflux disease, use of ACE inhibitors, disease of upper respiratory tract, etc.).
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has COPD and meets several inclusion criteria, but the cough is not associated with eating.
